mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_staff where staff_code=#{staff_code} and status = '0'

SELECT d.* FROM sys_staff a ,sys_staff_role_rel b,sys_privilege_rel c,sys_menu d WHERE a.staff_code = #{staff_code} AND a.status = '0' AND a.staff_id = b.staff_id AND b.role_id = c.role_id AND c.privilege_type = 'menu' AND c.privilege_obj_id = d.menu_id AND d.status = '0'

SELECT d.* FROM sys_staff a ,sys_staff_role_rel b,sys_privilege_rel c,sys_button d WHERE a.staff_code = #{staff_code} AND a.status = '0' AND a.staff_id = b.staff_id AND b.role_id = c.role_id AND c.privilege_type = 'btn' AND c.privilege_obj_id = d.btn_id AND d.status = '0'

SELECT e.menu_children_url FROM sys_staff a ,sys_staff_role_rel b,sys_privilege_rel c,sys_menu d,sys_menu_children e WHERE a.staff_code = #{staff_code} AND a.status = '0' AND a.staff_id = b.staff_id AND b.role_id = c.role_id AND c.privilege_type = 'menu' AND c.privilege_obj_id = d.menu_id AND d.status = '0' AND d.menu_id = e.menu_id AND e.menu_children_url != ''
